mapper.select: SELECT b.board_id, b.title, b.content, b.writer, b.file_name, b.inserted, b.updated, m.nickName FROM picBoard b JOIN Member m ON b.writer = m.member_id ORDER BY board_id DESC LIMIT #{from}, #{items}
SELECT b.board_id, b.title, b.content, b.writer, b.file_name, b.inserted, b.updated, m.nickName FROM picBoard b JOIN Member m ON b.writer = m.member_id WHERE b.board_id = #{id}
